articles.author: DappRadar
articles.description: Nearly a billion dollars in crypto assets have been stolen from blockchain bridges in 2022.
articles.title: How Blockchain Bridges Became Hackers’ Prime Targets

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: Ether balances on exchanges drop to lowest level since August 2018 while ETH locked in DeFi continues to rise.
articles.title: Traders Move ETH out of Centralized Exchanges and into DeFi

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: 71% of Wikipedia voters ask the Wikimedia Foundation to stop accepting cryptocurrency donations.
articles.title: Wikipedia Community Pushes Back Against Crypto Donations

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: The most recent test processed mainnet transactions on a “shadow fork” – a subset of proof-of-work nodes that had been merged with the Beacon Chain to process proof-of-stake transactions.
articles.title: Ethereum’s Merge Delayed Despite Successful ‘Shadow Fork’ Test

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: DTCC to explore whether a Federal Reserve-issued digital currency could clear a trade as soon as a brokerage sends the money.
articles.title: Major US Clearing House Experiments with CBDC for Real-Time Settlements
